sentences: Poisid said karistuse põhjusel koolivaheajal jooksmisest.
Ta otsustas mitte minna põhjusel halva ilma tõttu.
context: The Estonian word 'põhjusel' is an adessive case form of the noun 'põhjus', which means 'cause' or 'reason'. When used in this form, it functions as a prepositional phrase meaning 'because of' or 'due to', indicating the cause or reason for something. It's commonly used at the beginning of sentences or clauses to explain why something happened.
